name: Pheelz
description: ''' Phillip Kayode Moses''' (born 5 June 1994), better known as '''Pheelz''', is a Nigerian [[record producer]], singer, songwriter, and graphic designer. Pheelz is credited to have produced all but one song on Olamide's ''[[Baddest Guy Ever Liveth]]'' album. In 2022, he had a hit with his song "[[Finesse (Pheelz song)|Finesse]]", a collaboration with [[Bnxn]] (formerly known as Buju).
